H0.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Bhikkhus

H1.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Geshes

H2.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Tulku

H3.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Lamas

A4.text: Geshe (Tibetan: དགེ་བཤེས་, Wylie: dge-bshes, short for dge-ba'i bshes-gnyen, 'virtuous friend'; translation of Skt. kalyāņamitra) or geshema is a Tibetan Buddhist academic degree for monks and nuns.

A5.text: The degree is emphasized primarily by the Gelug lineage, but is also awarded in the Sakya and Bön traditions.
